entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
